channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics Workspace
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics Workspace

item.title: CVE-2021-39040|2024-09-16T17:28:38.451Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20workspace
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Workspace 2.0 could be vulnerable to malicious file upload by not validating the file types or sizes. Attackers can make use of this weakness and upload malicious executable files into the system and it can be sent to victim for performing further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 214025.

item.title: CVE-2022-22392|2024-09-16T16:37:41.303Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20workspace
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 could allow an attacker to upload arbitrary executable files which, when executed by an unsuspecting victim could result in code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 222066.

item.title: CVE-2022-22314|2024-09-16T16:48:24.901Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20workspace
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 217371.
